idea:
Vriv tech is a technology company founded in 2018 with its operations base in Mumbai, India. It endeavours to enter

the mobile Instant Messaging space with its unique communication app that is currently being developed. This app

which uses a patented technology is the first market offering from this company and is certainly the first-of-its-kind

solution in the Instant Messaging category of apps.

The organization intends to tap the niche market by its unique communication technology.
name: VRIV TECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

Our Company Registration in Navi Mumbai team have the best skills and the latest technology to deliver the best required for your business. we are best CA in Navi Mumbai that builds value for customers through innovative  use of technology, support, service and customer Referrals. we are also leading service provider of LLP  registration in Mumbai, we are not only best in the New online Company Registration in india but also we are best in the one person company registration. 

Our object is to help the entrepreneur to fulfill their legal and regulatory requirements and be a partner

throughout the business life cycle by offering support and consultancy at every stage by section 8 company registration services to ensure the business remains continually growing.
name: Make my filing

idea:
Callido empowers educators globally to develop every learner into a critical thinker. We are a learning science organisation on a mission to help each student develop core skills for success: critical thinking, problem-solving, research and writing. Leading educational institutions across 15+ countries leverage our standard - aligned resources to: (i) easily track and benchmark their students' skills; (ii) reliably and measurably develop students' critical thinking skills; (iii) scaffold the shift to concept-based and inquiry based learning for their teachers; and (iv) transform their admissions process

We currently offer - Assessments for critical thinking skills, inquiry-based, interactive learning tools for critical thinking for ages 11 - 18, course companions for IB Schools - Extended Essay Companion, DP Maths Skills Companion, Personal Project Companion, and platforms to support large-scale inquiries, design thinking/Maker initiatives and project-based learning
name: Callido Learning Private Learning

idea:
ALMARI is a service that gives a chance to store occasional wears, business suits, premium garments etc, in a safe, secure and careful manner.


ALMARI was founded in January 2019 by Leher Ali, who is just 18 years of age and currently pursuing a bachelor’s degree in Commerce from Mithibai College, Mumbai.


The ALMARI service is managed by her mother, Sanha Ali, who is the co-founder of ALMARI. Together this mother-daughter team has successfully launched this unique concept, which is India’s first premium garment storage startup.


Occasion wear is always difficult to store, and needs careful handling, it requires prudent storage and extra care. 


ALMARI offers to house your outfits and make sure they’re available for you to wear, exactly when you need them in a Ready-To-Wear condition.


All garments are kept in a specially designed ALMARI Care-House


Every Care-House is fitted with Air-Purifiers and Air-Conditioners 


All garments are kept inside a dust-proof cover


Every garment is always kept on Hangers to avoid folds


Each and every garment goes into a maintenance cycle in every 15 days using Garment Steamer to remove bad odour


ALMARI is a service that allows you to keep premium wear, in a Premium Manner


Safety & Security

Each garment is assigned with a unique Code number, which is linked with respective Customer ID


The Care-House is monitored with CCTV cameras 24x7


A register entry is maintained for each garment when delivered to customer and also when received from customer


All garments have insurance cover


Convenience to customers

Photographs of the garments, with the unique code number, is shared with the respective customer


Free delivery & pickup 


ALMARI ensures that your clothes are made available to you when you want to wear them, in a Ready-To-Wear condition.


ALMARI is fully operational in the city on Mumbai & Delhi.


Vision: To be customer’s first choice when it comes to storing & maintaining of premium garments & accessories, globally.


Mission: To provide a professional and most organised service to customers for keeping their premium garments & accessories in perfect shape, all year round.
name: ALMARI
